Name: Apple Pie
AddToolTip: 'Home-made and just asking to be eaten!'
Will increase life regeneration for a time if eaten directly
Eating the Cook's food will make you full for 45 seconds

Name: Blood Potion
ToolTip: Increases melee, mining and movement speed

Name: Conflagration Potion
ToolTip: You are set ablaze, but damage is increased moderately

Name: Explosive Coating
ToolTip: Throwing attacks will have a chance to detonate, hitting nearby enemies

Name: Deep Freeze Coating
ToolTip: Throwing attacks will have a chance to significantly hinder the hit enemies movement

Name: Frost-Heart Elixir
ToolTip: Freezes you in place, but massively increases health regeneration and defense
